name: Bravo Sample: Multiple API Requests
description:
Made for Bravo Studio.


Connect data from multiple API requests in your Bravo app with this sample Figma file setup. 🤓


To see the final result, log in to Bravo Studio > Sample Apps section and duplicate this app. The duplicated app will include a connected API collection and data binding. Test it with Bravo Vision previewer app 🚀


Learn more about connecting multiple API requests per app page in the Bravo Studio help center.


Check out Bravo Studio 👏

www.bravostudio.app
